title: My Spotify Discover Weekly
subtitle: Songs that Spotify thinks I'll like. Updated weekly.
description: 'Discover Weekly' is a personalized playlist created for each individual user. It is updated every Monday and consists of 30 songs that Spotify's algorithms believe the user will enjoy based on their listening history, liked songs, and preferences.

fields.name: Track Name
fields.description: Name or title of the song on Spotify

fields.name: Track URI
fields.description: Unique identifier for each track on Spotify

fields.name: Artist Name(s)
fields.description: Name(s) of the artist(s) who recorded the song

fields.name: Artist URI(s)
fields.description: Unique identifier(s) for the artist(s) on Spotify

fields.name: Album Name
fields.description: Name of the album to which the track belongs

fields.name: Added At
fields.description: Date and time when the track was added to the playlist
